text: @ShashiTharoor @DilliDurAst @PMOIndia @PMOIndia Neither Achieved Reduction in #COVID19 Cases & Destroyed the Eco. @narendramodi should be held Responsible for the #migrantcrisis As cases are Rising why #lockdown is relaxed? The Govt. is Responsible for the #COVID19 Deaths
